info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH GUSTY WIND AND HEAVY WILL IMPACT INDIANA...WESTMORELAND... SOUTHEASTERN ARMSTRONG AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, radar indicated thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Ford City to near New Stanton. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Indiana, Jeannette, Latrobe, Homer City, Murrysville, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, Youngwood, and Derry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 56 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 74 and 89, and between mile markers 93 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
